# Allow all AI crawlers to access and index this site
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Site Information
Site-name: Context Collective
Site-url: https://context-collective.org
Language: fr-FR
Description: Communauté d'ingénierie IA générative à Brest. Apprendre en public.

# - Search and retrieval augmented generation (RAG)
# - Knowledge extraction and summarization

# - Landing page with community information
# - News articles about AI engineering
